meta.browser_warning: Use Google Chrome or Opera for a better experience. Edge is reported as not compatible!

header.description_title: How is this different from other generators?
header.description_text: Well, let's be honest. There are too many generators out there. But all of them lack one feature or another. Our generator has all features you might need to configure your server!
header.discord_suggestion: âš ï¸ If you have cool ideas, suggest them in our official discord server.
header.donate_text: If you found this tool useful, consider making a donation for our hard work. We appreciate it!

alonso_color.title: Bring this format to Minecraft now!
alonso_color.description:
Stop copying and pasting! With AlonsoColor (Fabric Mod), you can create presets and type in gradients automatically.
Create and save presets to use anytime, anywhere!
More information about AlonsoColor on GitHub.
alonso_color.help_text: Copy and paste this command to create it and select it with .ac set {{identifier}}

data.input_import: Paste your exported options and press enter to import.
data.footer_note: ğŸ’ Supports also the content generated from Decode feature below.

decoder.title: Decode a gradient you have and obtain the colors used for this gradient:
decoder.input_placeholder: Paste the gradient you want to decode.
decoder.footer_note: The value above is the threshold. Increase it if you consider you get too many colors. Alt + click to modify by 10.
